name: Bird Bird Match
description:
New addictive match 3 puzzle game. Just try to match 3 or more birds in a row!

Bird Bird Match features:

● Cute birds in different colors!
● Hundreds of challenging puzzles to solve - more being added every month!
● Easy and fun to play, challenging to master. Build up to a bird popping mania!
● Unlock new worlds and discover new obstacles to overcome!
● Helpful magical powerups and boosters to beat tough levels (e.g. mint and count down bombs)
● Play alongside friends and competitors on social networks!

Tips and tricks:

- Try to set up chain reactions to enjoy higher scores as a cacophony of birds tumble and fall from the board!
- On mint levels, remove them as fast as possible before it spreads!
- Remember to keep an eye on count down bombs!
- Keep making appointments to play to earn free spins of the bonus prize wheel!
- Try out different avatars (tap on your avatar) - there are more than 30 cute n cuddly animals to choose from!
- Mix and match your super birds!

DOWNLOAD AND MATCH TODAY!
